examples.example: 遇到问题我们可以一起商量出一个好的解决方案。

translate.english: When encountering problems, we can discuss together to come up with a good solution.

examples.example: 大家坐下来好好商量如何让这次活动举办得更加精彩。

translate.english: Everyone sit down and discuss carefully how to make this activity more wonderful.

examples.example: 我们可以互相商量如何更好地提升自己的能力。

translate.english: We can discuss with each other on how to better improve our own abilities.
